name.str_sp: XL Gallian P.31 Light Arm Protection

description: Arm protection designed to protect the elbows, upper arm and shoulders from shell fragment and glancing bullet shots. Relatively lightly constructed, this armor is used primarily by gallian scouts.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str_sp: XL Gallian P.33 Medium Arm Protection

description: Arm protection designed to protect the elbows, upper arm and shoulders from shell fragment and glancing bullet shots. Relatively moderately constructed, this armor is used primarily by gallian stormtroopers.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str_sp: XL Gallian P.33 Heavy Arm Protection

description: Arm protection designed to protect the elbows, upper arm and shoulders from shell fragment and glancing bullet shots. Heavily constructed, this armor is used primarily by gallian Lancers.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A thick pair of leather gloves backed by fur. Very warm and comfortable  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A thick pair of leather gloves.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
